name: Befriendment
description: You target an adjacent creature and charm them for the next minute if they fail a resilience check of 9. If this spell fails, both you and the target take 5 psychic damage. A creature can only be the target of this spell once per day.
charge: If this spell fails, no damage is done and the target is not aware you channeled a spell unless they make a magic or logic check of 10.
